__TOC__

== New Features ==
** data: klog.json: Add some more ACPI related kernel error messages (LP: #1219006)
** UEFI: move the UEFI tests into the UEFI category (LP: #1207200)
** UEFI: add some global variables for uefidump utility (LP: #1221078)
*** uefi: uefidump: Add support for !HwErrRecSupport
*** uefi: uefidump: Add support for !OsIndicationsSupported
*** uefi: uefidump: Add support for !VendorKeys
** ACPICA:enable 64bit build for aarch64 architecture

== Fixed Bugs ==
** lib/fwts_uefi.c: fix time-of-use race on open/stat (LP: #1209251)
** lib: fwts_cpu.c: fix time-of-use race on stat/open (LP: #1209225)
** lib: fwts_dump: remove the redundant path in fwts_dump_info (LP: #1216344)
** fwts: framework: Add missing closed parenthesis for -U option (LP: #1219576)

== fwts-live ==
** Starting from version 13.09, FWTS-Live will be released in parallel with FWTS and will be following the same versioning scheme.
** FWTS-Live 13.09 will be built upon FWTS 13.09 and will be available in late September.
** Beta version of FWTS-Live 13.09 is available from http://people.canonical.com/~alexhung/fwts-live/.

== Known Issues ==
** Some UEFI tests are missing in fwts-live (beta version)
